general_info.summary: This document outlines various academic and administrative programs and resources at Sharda University. It details specific schools within the university, such as Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, and Nursing Science & Research, along with reports on examinations and curriculum feedback. The content also highlights university-wide initiatives like the Academic Bank of Credits, leadership and history, statutory bodies, tenders, and crucial guidelines for students regarding visa and medical insurance. Additionally, it showcases student development programs focusing on skills, entrepreneurship, and communication, as well as media outreach through FM radio and a mentoring portal.

career_info.summary: This text outlines key information about a basic sciences course, detailing application procedures, potential career paths, and typical student placements with an average annual package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA. It encourages individuals to consider this program for their career advancement.
